title: AquaFunded Special Offer: 40% OFF + 120% Refund
description: Take your trading to the next level with a 40% discount on all AquaFunded challenges. Use code AQUA40 to save and get a 120% refund on your fees.
seo_content:
AquaFunded 40% OFF: Exclusive Special Offer

AquaFunded has released a new special offer for serious traders. By using the code AQUA40, you can secure a 40% discount on your next trading challenge and benefit from an enhanced refund policy.

Price Breakdown with AQUA40

  • $5K Sea Horse Challenge: $57 → $37
  • $10K Fish Challenge: $103 → $66
  • $25K Ray Challenge: $217 → $141
  • $50K Dolphin Challenge: $317 → $206
  • $100K Shark Challenge: $517 → $336
  • $200K Whale Challenge: $997 → $648

Offer Highlights

This exclusive deal is designed to make it easier for ambitious traders to get funded: Massive Savings (40% flat discount), Enhanced Refund (120% back), and Elite Conditions (90% profit split).

youtube_metadata.title: AquaFunded Coupon AQUA40 | 40% OFF Discount & 120% Refund
youtube_metadata.description: Save 40% on all AquaFunded challenges using the exclusive code AQUA40. Plus, enjoy a 120% fee refund on your first payout. Verified current deal.
